long_description: Rugged yet nimble, The North Face Cinder 32 Pack exudes sport-climbing perfection-great for when you're clipping bolts or hitting the gym. Comfortable, single-stay suspension features a polypropylene framesheet, breathable foam back panel, webbing hipbelt and sternum strap with safety whistle. Flat-bottom design stands up on its own for easy loading. Top-loading main compartment features a lid flap with a pocket. 840-denier polyurethane-coated nylon stands up to rough action in the rocks. The North Face Cinder 32 Pack features a handy stash pocket and load-bearing haul loops.
short_description: Rugged yet nimble, The North Face Cinder 32 Pack exudes sport-climbing perfection-great for when you're clipping bolts or hitting the gym.
